subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Don Mattingly, whose true ambition was to be the Yankees  manager after Joe Torre when he joined the coaching staff, was said to be impressive Tuesday when he interviewed for the job.
snippet: Don Mattingly, whose true ambition was to be the Yankees  manager after Joe Torre when he joined the coaching staff, was said to be impressive Tuesday when he interviewed for the job.
